insights.populationGrowth: Growing 1.8% with agricultural development and cross-border trade with Vietnam and Cambodia.
insights.educationLevel: Moderate 68% literacy with rural agricultural focus and ethnic diversity challenges.
insights.employmentPattern: Agriculture 62%, forestry 15%, mining 10%, government 8%, services 5%. Subsistence agriculture dominates.
insights.housingPattern: Traditional stilt houses 70%, concrete houses 20%, temporary shelters 10%.

insights.temperature: Tropical monsoon climate, warm year-round with temperatures 22°C-35°C. Hot dry season and warm wet season.
insights.precipitation: Annual precipitation 2,400mm heavily concentrated in monsoon (May-October). Dry season water stress common.
insights.seasonality: Hot dry season (November-April), wet monsoon season (May-October) with intense rainfall and flooding.
insights.extremeEvents: Severe monsoon flooding, flash floods, droughts during failed monsoons, tropical storm impacts.

trends.precipitationTrend: More intense monsoon events with longer dry periods
trends.floodRisk: Increasing frequency and severity of flooding
trends.droughtRisk: Extended dry seasons becoming more common

recentEvents.impact: Villages evacuated, rice paddies flooded, livestock losses
Water shortages, crop stress, well depletion

recentDisasters.impact: Catastrophic flooding, 71 deaths, thousands displaced, long-term economic devastation
Agricultural areas flooded, infrastructure damage, temporary displacement

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Low - Remote location, limited infrastructure, dependence on external aid

infrastructure.evacuationRoutes: Limited by terrain and seasonal roads

economicProfile.businessEnvironment: Agricultural economy with hydropower development, vulnerable to dam risks and flooding
